channel.title: CSR Messages on Ava Francesca Battocchio

item.title: “Do Good and Be ‘Liked’”: CSR Messages on Social Media during COVID-19 Pandemic and Consumer Responses
item.description: This study examines CSR messages on social media during COVID-19 and their impact on consumer engagement, brand attitudes, and trust.
